brand_info.name: Trattoria L'Italiano Bariloche
brand_info.tagline: Descubre la auténtica cocina italiana en el corazón de Bariloche. Una experiencia gastronómica única.
brand_info.positioning: Authentic Italian dining experience in San Carlos de Bariloche, offering traditional homemade pasta, rich risottos, wood-fired pizzas, and a warm, welcoming atmosphere, focusing on quality, value, and creating memorable culinary journeys.
brand_info.vision: To be the quintessential destination for authentic Italian cuisine in Bariloche, creating cherished culinary memories for every guest.
brand_info.mission: To craft every meal with passion and precision, using fresh ingredients and heartwarming traditional Italian recipes, delivered with warm hospitality and exceptional service in an inviting environment.
brand_info.origin_story: Rooted in the rich heritage of Italian cooking, Trattoria L'Italiano prides itself on preparing dishes, especially pasta, with the patience and dedication of past generations, evoking the traditional methods of 'nonnas and nonnos'.

brand_values.brand_promise: An unforgettable gastronomic journey to Italy, filled with authentic flavors, generous portions, and a warm, welcoming atmosphere.
differentiators: Homemade pasta crafted with traditional recipes
Warm and welcoming atmosphere with rustic Italian decor
Exceptional service from polite and attentive staff
Good value for money with comprehensive meal offerings

psychographics.lifestyle: Food enthusiasts, travelers seeking authentic local experiences, families looking for comforting meals, couples desiring a cozy evening out.
psychographics.behavior: Dines out regularly, appreciates traditional cuisine, seeks recommendations, values a friendly atmosphere, enjoys sharing meals.

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Direct, descriptive, evocative, welcoming, emphasizing sensory experiences and heritage.
tone_of_voice.language_register: Informal yet respectful, engaging, slightly poetic when describing food.
preferred_structures: Sensory descriptions of food and ambiance
Direct invitations to experience the restaurant
tone_dos: Emphasize the sensory experience of dining
Highlight the welcoming nature of the staff and ambiance
tone_donts: Focus solely on price without mentioning value
Use overly trendy or fleeting language
Neglect the human element of hospitality

logo.primary_logo: Likely a classic, perhaps slightly rustic, wordmark or emblem incorporating Italian motifs (e.g., wheat, a chef's hat, an Italian flag element).
logo.usage_rules: Clear space around the logo, consistent sizing across all applications, always legible.
logo.lockup_behavior: Used prominently on signage, menus, and digital headers. May appear subtly on tableware or staff uniforms.
logo.safe_area: Sufficient clear space to ensure readability and impact, proportional to the logo's size.

color_system.color_usage_rules: Primary colors for branding and key accents. Secondary colors for warmth, texture, and supporting elements. Maintain a warm, inviting palette.

typography.primary_font: Serif font with a classic, slightly rustic feel (e.g., a traditional Garamond or a more decorative script for headings).
typography.secondary_font: Clean, legible sans-serif for body text, complementing the primary font without competing.

weights.headlines: Bold or semi-bold for impact and hierarchy
weights.captions: Light or regular for subtle information

spacing.letter_spacing: Standard to slightly open for headlines, standard for body text.
spacing.line_height: Comfortable for readability, especially in menus and descriptive text.

layout_principles.grid_system: Flexible grid, allowing for both structured menu layouts and more organic, inviting photographic compositions.
layout_principles.white_space_ratio: Moderate, allowing elements to breathe without feeling sparse; balances content with visual comfort.
layout_principles.image_vs_text_balance: High emphasis on imagery, especially food and ambiance photos, balanced with descriptive text.
layout_principles.cta_placement: Clear and prominent for reservations and contact information, often at the bottom or side of digital content.
layout_principles.alignment: Typically centered or left-aligned for text, with imagery often taking a more dynamic or full-bleed approach.

style.camera_feel: Natural, slightly intimate, capturing moments of enjoyment and the tactile quality of food.
style.pose_guidelines: For food: natural, artfully arranged but not overly stylized, showing generous portions. For people: candid, relaxed, joyful, interacting with food and company. Staff: attentive, smiling, professional.
style.casting_attitude: Genuine happiness, warmth, appreciation for food and company. Staff are welcoming and knowledgeable.

technical.lighting: Warm, inviting, often soft ambient lighting with strategic highlights on food. Mimics natural evening light or cozy indoor settings.
technical.contrast: Moderate to high, to make food pop and enhance the richness of colors, while maintaining a soft overall feel for ambiance.
technical.grain: Minimal to none, for a clean, professional look, but not overly sterile.
technical.depth_of_field: Shallow to moderate, to focus attention on hero dishes or key elements in ambiance shots, blurring backgrounds to create intimacy.
technical.color_grading: Warm and rich, enhancing natural food colors (reds, greens, yellows) and the cozy atmosphere. Slightly desaturated backgrounds to keep focus on the main subject.

visual_tone: Celebration of shared meals and hospitality
preferred_locations: Exterior shots showcasing the Bariloche setting (if relevant to specific campaign)

model_casting.age_range: Children to seniors, reflecting a diverse clientele.
model_casting.diversity: Diverse groups of people, emphasizing inclusivity and broad appeal.
model_casting.attitude: Happy, engaged, relaxed, enjoying the food and company.

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Dishes are the clear heroes, presented front and center, often in close-up.
product_presentation.styling_approach: Rustic, natural, abundant. Food is presented as ready to eat, with steam or fresh garnishes. Table settings are inviting, not overly minimalist.

motion_rules.pacing: Moderate to slow, allowing viewers to appreciate details of food preparation, plating, and the dining experience. Smooth transitions.
motion_rules.transitions: Gentle fades, subtle cuts, or slow pans to maintain a relaxed and inviting feel.

visual_dos: Emphasize fresh ingredients and traditional preparation
visual_donts: Use sterile or overly modern aesthetics
Feature cold or unappetizing food photography
Use stock photography that doesn't match the brand's authentic feel
copy_dos: Use evocative language about taste and experience
Highlight the hospitality and friendly service
Mention homemade pasta and traditional recipes
copy_donts: Use overly casual or unprofessional language

must_remain: High quality of food and service
Emphasis on traditional recipes and homemade pasta
can_evolve: Specific menu items (while maintaining core categories)
Interior decor updates (while retaining rustic Italian feel)
test_zone: Collaborations with local producers (if aligned with Italian theme)

retail.soundscape: Soft Italian background music, lively but not overwhelming chatter, sounds of cooking from the kitchen.

digital.tone_adjustment: Slightly more concise and visually driven for social media, more descriptive for website and newsletters.

content_ratio.motion_vs_static: 70% static images (high-quality food shots), 30% motion (short videos of ambiance, food preparation, happy diners).

platform_behavior.Instagram: High-quality food photography, engaging stories of daily specials, behind-the-scenes glimpses, customer reposts, focus on visual appeal and short, enticing captions.
platform_behavior.Website: Comprehensive menu, reservation system, detailed 'about us' section, high-resolution gallery of food and interior, clear contact information, testimonials.
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Highlighting new dishes, special events, chef's notes, exclusive offers (non-discount), stories about Italian traditions, engaging and informative.

print.paper: Textured, slightly matte paper for menus and flyers, evoking a rustic and quality feel.
print.cover_rules: Clean design with prominent logo and appetizing food imagery. Minimal text, focusing on key offerings or a strong visual.

logo_misuse_examples: Changing logo colors to non-brand palette
Placing the logo on busy or unreadable backgrounds
Using outdated versions of the logo
